divs: Sighting Detailsfacing east object appeared 2 oclock high moving high rate of speed. witnessed 2 zigzag patterns followed by a 120 instintaneous 120 degree chabge of direction. slowed to an apparent stop then resumed original course followed by another zigzag pattern. in the next 4 to 5 seconds, then traveled to a distance that ook it out of sight. fhis is only 1 of 4 sightings,2 of which occured in broad daylight. too many details two list by typed method. daylight sightings were at an altitude of below controlled airspace.
